title: GD Summer Battle 2015
body:
Ezreal told me post this here because he can't

Post by Ezreal Edgeworth on 5 hours ago
Kite's thread is related to this: genericdiscussion.freeforums.net/thread/25257/tourney-gd

This is going to be Boards VS Kite's GD

Layout

There will be 2 teams from each GD. Each Team will fight each of the opposing GD's teams once. If both of the same GD's team tie, there will be a tie breaker for who plays for 1st.

Example: If both of Kite's GD teams go 1-1. They have to vs each other to see who moves on.


Dates
Tuesday: July 7th 2PM PST/5PM EST
Group Stage
(4-6 Games total)

Wednesday: July 8th 2PM PST/5PM EST
Playoffs for 1st/2nd/3rd/4th best of 3s
(4-6 Games total)


Stream/Shoutcasters
Interested? Let me know

Teams
Boards Team 1:

Boards Team 2:

PBGD Team 1:

PBGD Team 2:


Each team can have up to 4subs.


Rewards? Ask Kite if he wants to give you guys anything for winning.

(source : http://genericdiscussion.freeforums.net/thread/25258/gd-summer-battle-2015)
